summary.description: Concise summary of the paper's content in English (1-3 sentences; use placeholder text if information is missing).

summary_cn.description: Concise summary of the paper's content in Chinese (1-3 sentences; use placeholder text if information is missing; for untranslatable technical terms, use parentheses for English).

keywords.description: Comma-separated list of up to 10 relevant English keywords.

interpretability.description: Score (1-10): high if directly related to white-box model interpretability.

understanding.description: Score (1-10): high if it significantly improves understanding of artificial systems.

safety.description: Score (1-10): high if the paper addresses AI safety.

technicality.description: Score (1-10): high if the work is deeply technical or methodologically rigorous.

surprisal.description: Score (1-10): high if the paper presents surprising, novel, or highly interesting results.

failure_mode_addressed.description: Category: one of {human-misuse, misalignment, societal-disruption, other, non-applicable}.

primary_focus.description: Category: one of {interpretability, alignment, robustness, control, other}.

is_mech_interp.description: Binary verdict (0 or 1): 1 if the paper is about mechanistic interpretability, 0 otherwise.

is_ai_safety.description: Binary verdict (0 or 1): 1 if the paper is about AI safety (alignment, control, governance), 0 otherwise.
